#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
ll gcd(ll a,ll b){
    if(b > a) return gcd(b,a);
    if(b==0) return a;
    else return gcd(b,a%b);
}
bool findfactor(ll m,ll n){
    if(n==1) return false;
    ll d=gcd(m,n);
    if(d==1) return true;
    else return findfactor(m,n/d);
}
int main(){
    //freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);
    int TC;
    scanf("%d",&TC);
    while(TC--){
        ll m,n;
        scanf("%lld %lld",&m,&n);
        if(!findfactor(m,n)){
            printf("Yes\n");
        }
        else printf("No\n");
    }
}
